Image.description: Image to be displayed in the avatar of the object cell.

ImageText.description: Text to be shown in an image container when avatar image is not present.

Style.description: The string value is either a [style class name of `Image`](../../../Styles/ImageClass.style.md) or a [style class name of `ImageText`](../../../Styles/ImageTextClass.style.md) (supported CSS properties are background-color and color).
